translation.clickOnPageHint: You can click on the page number to enter it manually
translation.scaleWithMouseHint: You also can scale page using Ctrl + MouseWheel
translation.dragOrChooseFile: Drag & Drop a file here or click to choose manually

initialScreen.youCanOpenLinks: Now you can open links to .djvu files automatically (with a click) when the corresponding option is enabled.
initialScreen.tryToClickLinkFmt: Just try to click the link "%(linkToSampleDjvuFile)s" with the option enabled and disabled to understand what it is about.
initialScreen.chromeExtensionFmt: The Google Chrome's version of the extension allows to open local files by a browser directly (via a double-click). But you have to enable the %(allowAccessToFileUrls)s option on the extension's options page. Otherwise, the feature won't work.
initialScreen.clickHelpButtonFmt: Click the %(helpButton)s button to learn more about the application.
